info.name: Hide header - CNN Money
info.description:
(1) Collapses the header and the footer into thin strips at the top and bottom of the page, and redisplays them when you mouse over one of the strips.
(2) Moves the sidebar from the right side of the page to the left side, and auto-hides it as a thin vertical strip at the left edge of the page.
info.additionalInfo: This is a lazy version - the elements inside the footer and sidebar aren't hidden when the element is collapsed, so if you look closely you can see some of their content peeking through, and the article content doesn't expand to use the space left by the sidebar.
